timeline.bodyText: Just curious, are Exceptions besides IOException thrown here?
timeline.author: n1zea144

replies.bodyText:
There was a RuntimeException, but should be fixed with the fix above.
Just trying to cast a wider net since not being able to load the disambiguate file is not critical issue and shouldn't bring down the application.
replies.author: jjgao
sheridancbio

replies.bodyText: No it was b/c the entrez IDs in the file are human IDs and therefore do not exist in mouse genes, ie. gene==NULL. As a result, disambiguousGenes.put(parts[0], gene); throws runtime exception.
replies.author: jjgao

replies.bodyText: I am ok to revert this one as long as we get the change to line 99 in :)
replies.author: jjgao

timeline.bodyText: This is a good fix. It would not make sense to put pairs of <"GENEID", null> into the disambiguousGenes map.
timeline.author: sheridancbio
